CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(OverallRating__c < 1, "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(OverallRating__c < 2, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(OverallRating__c < 3, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(OverallRating__c < 4, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(OverallRating__c < 5, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Overall Rating
